column4: hello people, Question: Do I need the /ect/init.d/evms service (apt-cache show evms) to be able to have a stable system\?
what does !boot mean? I am familiar with all the tools I use update-rc.d btw
keywords prefixed with ! make the bot spit out a factoid with a (hopefully) helpful link to further docu... try yourself, type '!boot'
do you now if evms is a critical service
ok I will remove it :-D thanks
